details.sectionContent: It is very interesting event. In this the participants will be taught how to make object levitation . It will be an interesting and fun based event with technical parameters to learn and apply.

In this event there is practical application of electromagnetic levitation and also about hall effect. Through this event participants will learn about many diodes, sensors and also about magnetic suspension.
It will be an fun round. In this participants will be given a bowl with riddles to be solve the person who solves the riddles will proceed to the next round
In this participants will be given the king size maze to be solve and the one who will solve with least time will proceed to the other part
In this the students who cleared 1 & 2 round will come and they will be taught about magnetic levitation and how to make the circuit using hall sensor . and kit will be provided TAKE AWAY KIT.
